input_text: On May 12, two days after the announcement of a ceasefire between India and Pakistan, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi finally addressed the nation. He stated that the Indian army had only “paused” military action and Operation Sindoor, launched in the aftermath of the April 22 massacre in Pahalgam to target “terrorist hideouts”, had not ended.

reformatting.result: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi ceasefire India Pakistan military action Operation Sindoor terrorist hideouts Pahalgam massacre

news_query_extraction.result:
Text: On May 12, two days after the announcement of a ceasefire between India and Pakistan, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi finally addressed the nation. He stated that the Indian army had only “paused” military action and Operation Sindoor, launched in the aftermath of the April 22 massacre in Pahalgam to target “terrorist hideouts”, had not ended.
Extracted keywords: Ceasefire announcement, India-Pakistan relations, Narendra Modi address, Operation Sindoor, Military action pause
